name: Get Ogre It (Johan Plasencia)
description:
You have been cursed with the Ogrid-19 and you must escape before they kill you! This curse changes your appearance: you are a human but now you are a ogre, but then you transform back and forth.  If the opposite race sees you they will try to kill you. 

What are you going to do? Hiding is not an option 

REACH THE EXIT.
